articles.description: Argentina coach Javier Mascherano describes the chaotic ending to his team's  opening game of the Olympic football tournament as a "disgrace" and "a circus".
articles.title: Paris 2024: Argentina's Olympic football opener against Morocco a 'circus' - Javier Mascherano

articles.description: Antoine Dupont underlines why he is one of the faces of the Paris Olympics with a stunning solo try as France reach the quarter-finals of the men's rugby sevens.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Antoine Dupont leads France into rugby sevens quarter-finals

articles.description: The whistleblower who released a video that appears to show Charlotte Dujardin "excessively" whipping a horse is "not celebrating", says her lawyer.
articles.title: Charlotte Dujardin: Whipping video released to 'save dressage' - whistleblower

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner withdraws from the Paris Olympics with tonsillitis.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Jannik Sinner withdraws from tennis competition with injury, Salisbury to partner Watson in mixed doubles

articles.description: Canada apologise for allegedly flying a drone over a New Zealand women's football training session.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Canada apologise after allegedly flying drone over New Zealand training session

articles.description: Crowd trouble forces the first football match of the Olympics to be delayed by more than an hour with the game set to be completed in an empty stadium.
articles.title: Olympics football: Crowd trouble forces Argentina v Morocco match to be delayed

articles.description: Andy Murray says it is the "right time" for him to retire from tennis after the Paris Olympics - and he is "happy" with the decision.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Andy Murray says it is "the right time" for him to retire

articles.description: Italy defender Riccardo Calafiori is set to have a medical with Arsenal as his move from Bologna edges closer.
articles.title: Riccardo Calafiori: Italy defender set for Arsenal medical before move from Bologna

articles.description: Diver Tom Daley and rower Helen Glover are chosen as Great Britain's flagbearers at the opening ceremony for the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Tom Daley & Helen Glover to be GB flagbearers at opening ceremony

articles.description: Wada says it will take action against Usada in a move that could jeopardise the United States' hopes of hosting the 2028 and 2034 Olympics.
articles.title: United States' 2028 & 2034 Olympic hosting rights at risk as Wada takes action against Usada
